website_summaries.verdict: A luxurious product if you want to invest a little more money.
pros: Features natural Hawaiian ingredients like Maui sugar, Kukui oil, and shea butter
Cruelty-free and made without parabens or phthalates
A lightly sweet scent is noticeable
cons: Not as thick or as full of granules as other products

customer_reviews.title: Great lip scrub!
customer_reviews.text: I am in my twenties and suffered greatly from chapped lips since I can remember back in Pre-K. My lips would be chapped even during the summer months. I was constantly picking at my lips and making them bleed. Once I started using this scrub I noticed an immediate difference after just the first use. I continued to use it everyday for about 4 days. Now I can get away with only using it 2-3 times a week. It leaves my lips feeling silky smooth which is something I’ve never experienced before. After using this scrub I follow up with Jack Back lip balm to seal in the moisture. Great product. Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: hello

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other lip scrubs in the past and I am in love with this one. A lot of other lip scrubs are a lot more dry and have larger chunks of sugar to exfoliate with; however, this sugar scrub has a finer grain of sugar and has a more oily consistency. I prefer this because afterwards my lips not only feel smooth and soft, but they also feel moisturized. An added bonus is the fantastic smell that lingers on the lips for a short period after. All in all my favorite lip scrub so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Ogden

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great!
customer_reviews.text: I am not one to write product reviews but this has been great. I was debating between 4 and 5 stars due to the price of the item. Decided on 5 stars because this products actually works and I have noticed a difference since using it. My lips get dry and I tend to peel my lips, but with this I have not been having this issue. At first I thought the texture was not rough enough but I added a bit more onto my lips and got the right consistency for me. A little does still go a long way and it smells great.
customer_reviews.author: collegestudent

customer_reviews.title: my lips feeling nice and smooth
customer_reviews.text: been wanting or should I say needing a lip scrub in my life. My lips has been always dry and I only use chopsticks/Vaseline to help. I’ve heard about hanalei and give it a try. I’ve only use it once and I already see result. my lips feeling nice and smooth. took out dry skin off my lips. hopefully it’ll stay smooth once I wear my lipstick on.. overall I’m very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: antonette83x

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Always makes my lipstick looks 10 times better if I use this beforehand. I use to get that dead skin on the inner corners of my lips and it would bug me all day just wondering whether it was there or not. This is a lifesaver! Pair it with some concealer and your lips will really pop.
customer_reviews.author: KaptinKate

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Lightly scented and just enough oils to be moisturizing. Great price too. I will purchase again. I've used other sugar scrubs with similar ingredients that cost nearly 40.00 at a spa. I use in the morning in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Carey

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Product!
customer_reviews.text: This lip scrub smells and tastes amazing! lol It does the job and removes dead skin!
customer_reviews.author: Erika O.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I have great difficulty with my lips being dry in the winter, and this product has helped immensely! I also need to make sure my lips are moisturized during the day and all night, so I am pretty diligent about applying a lip balm. My only objection to the lip scrub is that I hate putting my fingers in the container because the product gets under my fingernails, so I take it out with a little makeup applicator and then put it on my finger for application. I have no complaints and only positive remarks for this Sugar Scrub.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great lip scrub which really does work!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sugar lip scrub by Hanalei Company! It is wonderful for your chapped lips and makes them feel so much smoother after a treatment! I use it as directed, and wipe it off with a tissue. When I am done I am left with a faint taste of sweet sugar (from Maui) and a tinge of citrus. I then continue on to lipstick or lip balm. I will never be without this sugar lip scrub in out harsh winters here in the Northeast again! It is cruelty free and contains no parabens. Great stuff! Try this one--You can't go wrong with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Katherine Baldridge

customer_reviews.title: Be careful about trying new products on your
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered in my search for a really good lip balm for my very dry lips. I checked the ingredients and thought it would be ok. It arrived in a timely manner and i eagerly applied it to my dry lips. Within 20 minutes I was scrubbing my poor peeling lips that looked more like a snake shedding it's skin and my skin was sloughing off in large thick pieces that were painful. For a while i was afraid I needed to go to an ER. I would like to show a photo but nothing could make me put it on again. No, i would not refer it to my friends or even my worst enemy.
customer_reviews.author: Westex Nana

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy with awesome immediate results
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love it. It’s quick and easy, which is huge for me with beauty products. I scrub scrub scrub until it’s gone and then they say to wipe off the access but most of the time I can just leave it on and use it as lip balm. Exfoliates perfectly and leaves lips feeling supple and hydrated. I also love the lip treatment Hanalei makes too, it’s actually what made me decide to choose this lip scrub over the others and I was definitely happy that I did.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: For a long time, I have had a problem with chapped lips. Tried all types of balms. Never thought of using an exfoliate. I made my first purchased based on the positive reviews. This product lives up to all of its claims. It has a nice creamy texture mixed with small granules of sea salt. I have very sensitive lips. Thus far, I have felt NO irritation/side affects. I also like the bubble gum favor as well. My lips feel softer than ever before. It would be nice if it came in a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Blueknight

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous ordering a lip scrub online again because last year I tried a different brand and it completely dried up my lips to the point they were cracking and bleeding. Just recently, due to the weather, my lips have been getting super dry.. the worst I have ever dealt with. I decided to try this scrub and really didn't want to initially because there are a lot of other cheaper brands but figured you get what you pay for in this situation. This stuff has been amazing to my lips. I use it every morning and noticed right away it was helping. My lips are now super soft and no longer dry
customer_reviews.author: MeXay

customer_reviews.title: best lip scrub I’ve had in years
customer_reviews.text: very good lip scrub would highly recommend. sorry the money for sure
customer_reviews.author: Joy The Toy Lover

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I usually suffer from chapped lips in the winter to begin with, but now having braces makes it 100x worse. I have tried all kinds of different lip balms and moisturizers and nothing was helping. I have used this product once (and followed up with their lip treatment) and the dryness and peeling is gone. I wish I had tried this a lot sooner. It would have saved me from weeks of dryness and soreness!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but not flavored
customer_reviews.text: So you may not want to swallow this because it’s definitely not flavored but it smells AMAZING and the texture of it adds to the amazing ness as well as the softness after you use this product. Now this is my first lip scrub and I’ve noticed how other scrubs have thick sugar in them and I wanted something I knew I could scrub my lips with , without worrying about big sugar crystals hurting my lips. I love how this gets a little oily in the end and I realized that’s what adds the moisture and softness. I felt a difference first try I would definitely suggest it for a regular lip scrub. Not a flavored scrub.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: yummy smelling
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing and is exfoliating without being painful! Some products con be too harsh but this one is very gentle. You also only need a little to go a long way so the container will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany B.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: My lips feels so much better - not at all tight and about to crack, the way they were.
customer_reviews.text: I came to write a five-star review and discovered a lot of people here ahead of me! This is so amazing! It worked immediately to give me soft, clear lips. See, I'm just pulling out of the flu. I used this lip scrub and suddenly everyone's oohing and aahing about how much *better* I looked and how the flu was clearly beat... For me, my lips feels so much better. Not at all tight and about to split, the way they were.
customer_reviews.author: Mrrphh

customer_reviews.title: Burned my lips
customer_reviews.text: I give up on anything but vasoline, which I know is not great. It's a chemical. But I tried a tentative amount of this, since my lips are sensitive. They have been burned for four days afterwards. They turned pink, which at first I thought I liked the tint, then they just started peeling and burning. There are a lot of chemicals in this. Seems like sugar scrub should be relatively simple.
customer_reviews.author: Allison K., Birmingham AL

customer_reviews.title: Best Product I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I don't have anything bad to say about this product. I had a bad reaction to some lip gloss and it left my lips with a rash. So search and came upon this product and read some comments and purchase some for myself and within 2 - 3 days the rash on my lips were gone. And my sister had the same problem so I gave her some and she got the same result. So when I get low on this product I will be reordering again.
customer_reviews.author: simone

customer_reviews.title: The savior of winter-blasted lips!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this scrub! Normally in the winter I end up chewing my lips to bits because of cracking and dead skin, even with Carmex or other lip balms. This winter though my lips are the softest they've ever been and haven't cracked even once. It's gentle and moisturizes but still gets rid of dead skin, it's easy to apply and use, and it leaves a sweet citrus aftertaste that I love. Definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a way to keep their lips feeling amazing.
customer_reviews.author: SeaCrane1

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This scrub is wonderful. My lips were smooth right after. Then I applied the Hanalei treatment afterwards, which made it even more smooth and soft. I wait a few minutes later then apply my lip balm. No regrets! I would definitely recommend it. I don't really smell anything ... Then again I haven't stuck my nose in it to take a whiff. But I'm certain that it is not strong. Otherwise, when I open the lid the odor would've hit me hard. Texture is like how a scrub should be.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Williams

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, feminine, spa-like
customer_reviews.text: The scrub is very luxurious; it smells lovely and the fine grain sugar and slick oil all make for a pleasant scrubbing experience. Also, the packaging is beautiful. The only reason I gave it four stars and not five is because, besides the more luxurious feel of this product, I don't notice a difference between it and regular coconut oil and white sugar DIY versions I've tried. But for a girly treat or gift I'd recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Doctor Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have dry mouth. It is not an uncommon condition when one takes allergy, sinus, and many other medications. My dentist told me to use Xylimelts for the dry mouth, and they have been absolutely amazing. I still would have dry and cracking lips. My internist told me to try a sugar lip scrub. She did not know a particular brand name so I tried Amazon. The lip scrub does help.The sugar helps to exfoliate the lips, and then there is a moisturizing agent, too. My lips do have more moisture and look sooooo much better. I am glad that I gave it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Smells/tastes just like pink lemonade. I’ve been looking for a new sugar lip scrub, and this one is definitely a good bang for your buck. It’s bigger than any other tub of lip scrub I’ve found and not much more expensive. It has finer sugar grains than I’m used to, but still does a great job at getting the dead skin off and leaving my lips soft!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, do not regret
customer_reviews.text: Excellent lip scrub. Smells and tastes great. Does a amazing job at exfoliating your lips, sugar is annoying to get off (often stays stuck in my beard). Also makes me lips look amazing. Other than that, this product is great! Also, the amount is worth the cost. Overall value is worth it
customer_reviews.author: Devin B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lip scrub
customer_reviews.text: This has worked wonderfully on my lips! My lips are constantly dry and flaky. I use this scrub morning and night and follow with Jack Black Intense Therapy lip balm (my holy grail of lip balms). I wouldn’t say the scrub is necessarily moisturizing, so I would definitely follow with a moisturizing balm that works for you. I also love the scent and flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! First product that got rid of my chapped lips!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I had severely chapped lips for months and after trying all the drugstore lip balms I decided to purchase this scrub. Started working with first use. Used twice a day along with their balm and in a couple weeks, my lips were no longer chronically chapped. Now I use the balm every day and I use the scrub once a week for maintenance. Mild smell and taste. Well worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie E.

customer_reviews.title: soft and definitely works
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells great and really does a great job of exfoliating my lips. I love that it feels soft when I rub it on my lips too. It takes a couple of tissues to wipe off, but my lips always feel super soft ALL DAY LONG after using this stuff. It is pricy for the size but it lasts a good while. I like that it actually tastes good when I accidentally get some in my mouth. :)
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Scrub
customer_reviews.text: I really like this scrub and how it tastes. Like, if you don’t wipe all of it off, the taste isn’t horrible. I’m not sure about moisturizing... I scrub for 1-2 min by rubbing my lips together and then take it off. It removes the dry, chapped parts of my lips. Then I use a strong moisturizer like Vaseline. The combo works nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the hanalei lip treatment for some time now, so I decided to get this scrub, mainly because my son suffers from chapped lips. I wanted to try this because I knew if it was as good as the lip treatment, then I would be making a good investment! One try on my sons cracked chapped lips tonight and with just the first go, his lips look and feel so much better! After applying the scrub and wiping it away, I had him apply the treatment and he even said they felt so much better already! Best part... neither items take much to apply, so they’ll last a good while! You won’t be disappointed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bell

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I think this product exfoliates and moisturizes very well. I've tried other sugar lip scrubs and none of them have made my lips feel so velvety afterwards. With normal scrubs I feel like I would immediately want to put on a lip treatment where as with this one I feel like I could comfortably pass if I desired.
customer_reviews.author: bgmudd

customer_reviews.title: Very good lip scrub.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this scrub. I just moved to a colder place and am glad I picked this up pre move. Every time my lips are dry I use this scrub then add a lip balm and my lips feel so much better. It teally works and I love the ingredients in it.
customer_reviews.author: FlGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this scrub especially for moisturizing the lips Long term. If you’re looking to lighten the lips(which is why I bought this in the first place) here’s a secret.. add Turmeric and lemon juice to the actual scrub. Exfoliate the scrub on your lips 2-3 times a day and let it sit for 3-5 minutes. Make sure you follow up with ur favorite lip balm/oil. I use a exfoliating lip scrub brush but if you don’t have that you can use the back of a toothbrush( the tongue cleaner) you can use the bristles on the toothbrush but I find that kind of harsh. THANK ME LATER!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawny

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice
customer_reviews.text: I got this on sale during cyber Monday week. I love the oils in it, they help my lips feel moisturized, but I haven’t noticed any long-term effects (such as no longer needing chapstick daily). Still, it’s a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Not needed
customer_reviews.text: It really doesn't do anything me me that could not be done with an old fashioned toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: E. Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Good but im allergic
customer_reviews.text: Edit: I used this and got pimples in the corners of my mouth so didnt use it until they healed. Used it again and then same thing happened. It's more than likely an allergy though. I gave it to my DIL and I believe she likes it. It worked really well right away. It exfoliated the dead skin and left my lips soft. It smells wonderful and even has a slightly sweet flavor if a bit gets in your mouth. I'll update if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Dahl

customer_reviews.title: not a scrub
customer_reviews.text: This is more of a lip moisturizer than it is a true sugar scrub. There are barely any granules but is very soft on lips. There are better products, even homemade that do a better job at exfoliating lips.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, but it is so worth the money!! A little bit goes a long way. Even just after two days using it as part of my nighttime skin care routine, it already made a huge difference on my lips! You can go completely bare on your lips the next morning and they still look hydrated/plumped! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Fe Kawohl

customer_reviews.title: Good Not Great
customer_reviews.text: Eh. Not sure I understand all the hype. It’s good, not great. I can honestly say my lips have been a little more dry than usual but don’t know it’s necessarily due to this product. I was overwhelmed considering all the hype.
customer_reviews.author: K DeAngelo

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This scrub is very fine and works great. A little bit goes along way so it's worth the price. I use it whenever I feel like I need it and it's not too harsh to use more than once a day. I usually use it after I wash my face in the morning and night and my lips look full and healthy. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking to improve the look and health of their lips. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kaity

customer_reviews.title: Love this product! Best lip scrub I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. It’s in the median price range for a lip scrub, but you get a lot of product for your money. This is definitely worth it. This removes all dead skin, but also nourishes and moisturizes at the same time. It’s a fine sugar scrub formula. As you are using it, it turns to an oily consistency, making it easy to run across the lips. Leaves my lips incredibly soft. Smells amazing too. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: loryn

customer_reviews.title: Works well, good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This product works really well and tastes good (for when you unavoidably taste some). Also, I have sensitive skin that gets irritated by a lot of different fragrances. This product is not unscented, but it didn't irritate my lips or skin.
customer_reviews.author: OrangePiggie

customer_reviews.title: Great product and worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lip scrub. The sugar Crystals are pretty large and that helps exfoliate more there also is a lot of oils in it to hydrate your lips while exfoliating ! Are use this every day I love it so much and it’s definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: 🌻KEᒪᒪY💚ᗰEᒪ🐝

customer_reviews.title: So delicious✨
customer_reviews.text: This tastes just like lemonade sugar 💗 it has just the right amount of moisture & sugar ratio. I always liked sugar scrubs for my lips because they dissolve and don’t damage your skin. This tastes so good and after you take it off leaves your lips really soft. It is a higher end scrub so I try not to use it but I can’t help it ! Really nice to use right before bed
customer_reviews.author: Bella 🐉💕☄️

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve suffered from dry/cracked/peeling lips since I was a kid. No amount of chapstick ever helped. I bought this product and was a little skeptical because on the first day, my lips were still peeling. But I’m on day 3 and my lips have never been so smooth!!! I use it twice a day (morning and night) and I apply the lip treatment after the scrub. It really is the best!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sensitive skin be careful
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for 2 weeks now and I do see a change in my lip coloration but not very much. I did start getting pimples around my upper lip, since i started using it. sensitive skin be careful!
customer_reviews.author: PBotcha

customer_reviews.title: Loving this!!
customer_reviews.text: I come from a long line of women with dry lips. My grandmother and mother used to peel their lips -yuck ! - but I have this option. I have lived it and the moisturizer !! I use it like a gloss by itself sometimes. ❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Pat B.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product for Great Lips!
customer_reviews.text: This was a stocking stuffer purchase for my daughter. I got another one in a different form (like lipstick) and that was a big hit. This one is a little different but was also a big hit. My daughter loved that this was soothing, moisturizing, and sweet. She doesn't use it as often because it's not just as convenient as putting on lipstick. I would still recommend this product because it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Jon W. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: The directions are simple enough and after trying it for close to a week, I am impressed with the results. I dislike dry, chapped lips and have been struggling to find something I would benifit from... THIS IS IT!! I recommend this item to any and everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: The hanalei lip treatment is by far my favorite so when i saw this i couldn’t wait to ...
customer_reviews.text: The hanalei lip treatment is by far my favorite so when i saw this i couldn’t wait to try it. The first time i used it and gently exfoliated. Let me emphasize GENTLY. and still, it left my lips feeling sunburned and in pain for 3 days after. i thought maybe I exfoliated too hard so i tried again a few weeks later and didn’t even run much at all just a light sweep and still had the same reaction. Very disappointed:(
customer_reviews.author: RLeon

customer_reviews.title: Love this scrub!
customer_reviews.text: Love it...I suffer from dry lips and this plus the lip balm used together make my lips so incredibly soft. A little bit goes a long way, so this little jar will last quite a while. Will definitely repurchase when I'm out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip scrub and definitely recommend it. It moisturizes my lips and makes my lips soft and pink and it smells so good. My lips are always peeling but I always use good chapstick and lip gloss and I've always made my own lip scrub but wanted to try something different. I'm so glad I went with Hanalei.
customer_reviews.author: Justmeandmine

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It is great for exfoliating your lips and you can use it as often as you like. My lemon is extremely dry so I normally have to end up putting on some sort of heavy lifting moisturizer afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: wendy short

customer_reviews.title: Only for non-problem lips
customer_reviews.text: This works great for keeping normal lips supple and soft. However if you’ve a severe, dry lip problem like I do the only Lip Apeel by skinlogics removes the dried peeling skin for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: A winner!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. So effective at removing the stubborn dry skin on the lips! Wonderful, mild sent. Citrus y. I will be ordering some of Hanalei products in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: JustMe2

customer_reviews.title: Saved my lips!
customer_reviews.text: This lip scrub is a life saver! During the winter my lips become dry and cracked and I was on the hunt for a really good lip scrub. I love Hanalei's lip treatment so I felt good about buying their scrub and I have not been disappointed. I keep the jar in my shower and use it maybe once a week so it definitely lasts. It doesn't have a weird taste if it gets in your mouth like other products I have tried. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: amber poe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually never write reviews for any products but this was a LIFE SAVER! I get the worst lips in the winter, and this has helped my from the embarrassment of having chapped lips at work and school! It’s absolutely amazing, smells amazing. I recommend anybody that has really chapped lips in the winter to get this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Nuvy Bhella

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer for lips
customer_reviews.text: This works great on my lips. I use it everyday before I go to bed it really helps moisturize my lips and it smells really good.
customer_reviews.author: ejpowell

customer_reviews.title: Too small for the cost
customer_reviews.text: How can something so small cost 15 bucks? I thought it was much bigger so I'd be getting bang for my buck. Apparently not. And it does NOT smell good. It smells like candy but with chemicals added. I don't like it
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and hydrating
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good! I only use this before bed. In the morning my lips are so smooth from only using this once a day. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Iovino

customer_reviews.title: Great for dryness!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with the same brand lip moisturizer and omg I am in love! I live in a very dry climate and this is giving me life! I can wear lipstick again, yay!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Sansburn

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice scrub and it definitely makes your lips soft. I would definitely chopstick or Vaseline on your lips after you use the scrub for even softer feel!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Light Lemon Scent
customer_reviews.text: It really helps keep chapped lips at bay. Sugar lemon flavor is nice if it gets past your lips. Noticable improvement in how dry my lips are. Highly enjoy and would recommend. Perfect stocking stuffer!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Binkley

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating, lemony
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I recently moved to Arizona and staying moisturized is difficult. This stuff is great for lips because it has the exfoliating effect without being drying while using. I of course immediately follow with lip balm but I love that this product does not dry like some do.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Collins

customer_reviews.title: Best lip scrub out there!
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft this scrub makes my lips feel. I use every 3-4 days. It’s really great in the winter when lips tend to chap. I’ve tried a lot of lip scrubs and this is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Gale M

customer_reviews.title: Great exfoliant
customer_reviews.text: This product very gently exfoliated my lips! I have a tendency to bit my lips and therefor have chapped lips. However, this product smooths put my lips significantly. It smells so good! And it works! I love that it is very natural as well! Very cute too! Basically, it’s perfect for everybody and looks cute on your bathroom shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Tenzin Choenyi

customer_reviews.title: Great for aging lips
customer_reviews.text: This is gentle on my drying lips, but does prepare them for their lip balm. I have tried one other product that does this, and this product is much better. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Denizen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Really moisturizing and a great sugar scrub does not leave my lips dry and I can use it everyday if I have too. Follow up with your favorite lip balm
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: This sugar scrub has become my nightly routine. It’s so wonderful! Smells good, and even tastes good. Ha! I use this scrub every other night or so- especially in the winter, it’s been amazing. And then I put chapstick on before bed. My lips are so soft in the morning! This scrub will always be a product I have all the time!
customer_reviews.author: brandon nicholls

customer_reviews.title: My lips are sooooo Soft now!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing and makes my lips so so soft and smooth. It smells and tastes amazing. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Karla M. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: No results!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why some reviewers report they have immediate results. The sugar is sweet and have a nice taste, but I didn’t purchase this product to get “ a sugar fix”. The shine, if you don’t wipe off as directed, lasts a few minutes. Lips aren’t healed or softened. Could’ve went to Walmart to purchase edible chapstick! Smh! Smh!
customer_reviews.author: Tameika

customer_reviews.title: Does What It's Supposed To Do
customer_reviews.text: My lips get chappy quite often so I was looking for a lip scrub. This one works well and it does not take a lot of product to use. It does what it's supposed to do. (thumbs up)
customer_reviews.author: DemV

customer_reviews.title: Best lip scrub!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this lip scrub!!!!! I wasn't sure about ordering it mainly because of the price but I'm so glad I did. Hanalei products will change your life!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Mulderink

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Best lip scrub I've ever tried. Tastes like lemonade and works great for making my lips smooth. Good price for the little bit you need to use. I use it about every other day followed by a lip balm and never have chapped lips.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Dafoe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wedding and it is amazing. I thought I was spending a little too much but wanted the perfect lips for my big day and the Utah air is dry. I didn't realize this would last me for so long! DO IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Item
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about trying but this is a must have product. My lips have never felt better. I used the lip scrub and then the moisturizer. My husband immediately responded calling my lips kissable and we both felt the difference. I use the moisturizer every night now and even my four year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! My lips are super soft and smooth! I am very glad I got this product. It is part of my facial skin care regimen. A little goes a long way! Delivered promptly and packaged nicely!
customer_reviews.author: vanmieghem

customer_reviews.title: Goods and Bads
customer_reviews.text: I like it but I definitely have to use more than a tissue to wipe it off. It helps to rinse it off with water or use a moist towel to wipe it off. I really like how it makes my lips feel afterwards but I don't think I'm seeing a long term benefit from using it
customer_reviews.author: NFam5

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product!!!! the smell is great and not too overpowering, and it doesn’t taste like chemicals! will def purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing. It honestly feels so good to use this ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG what had I been doing prior to getting this product?! This stuff is amazing. It honestly feels so good to use this product. You don't have to rub to hard for the exfoliate to works its magic. After you wipe it off it leaves your lips feeling so smooth and polished. A little also goes a long way which makes the price well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The smell is pleasant unlike other lip scrubs i've tried.
customer_reviews.text: The scrub has a nice texture.It's not too gritty and has a pleasant smell. The amount you get for the price is great! I also like the plastic seal that the product has because it ensures it won't dry out. It is perfect for exfoliating your lips before applying a drying lipstick or liquid lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Kissable lips
customer_reviews.text: Very nice gentle yet effective lip scrub. Gently exfoliates your lips with a slight plumping if used overnight. Recommend. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MissTee

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product so badly! Immediately after use, I broke out with a cold sore. I’m extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lip scrub! It doesn’t take much to work and it really does get rid of the dead skin and makes my lips looking refreshed and moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wall

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product . I bought the scrub and the 3 travel size lip color conditioners . The scrub is not too harsh at all and the conditioner is very emollient. Summer in the Desert is very harsh on lips and this is great! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Annie2b

customer_reviews.title: It's a fantastic lip scrub. 1 treatment and you'll agree
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. My lips become so dry and I have never had a lip treatment in my life but this stuff RULES
customer_reviews.author: Hellen Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great company and products
customer_reviews.text: I love this company and their products! I received the lip gloss in an Ipsy bag and knew I needed to try the lip scrub. It works, is free of harsh chemicals, and tastes good if you accidentally get some in your mouth :P
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Scott

customer_reviews.title: Third time buying
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!! This is my third time buying this. I use it at night to help exfoliate and moisturize my lips. Tastes and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this. It made my lips feel so much better with just the first use! Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: TDJ

customer_reviews.title: It's Fine
customer_reviews.text: This product is fine. It doesn't really scrub away the dead skin like I was hoping it feels good and smells good. Who doesn't like licking sugar off their lips. It's like a gitty lip blam.
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: This product is alright. I don’t mind using and it’s easy to use but I wouldn’t say I’m blown away by the results. Not sure I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Erin M.

customer_reviews.title: Pricy but it works
customer_reviews.text: I feel like you could probably get the same results if you just made your own sugar scrub and threw in some coconut oil. I like it for what it is, but probably won’t be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Aspitalieri

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This lip scrub is wonderful. So moisturizing, not too harsh, nice flavor and scent. My new favorite
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Works- but so does coconut oil and brown sugar
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, gentle exfoliator for your lips but I can't help but think that I could've saved my money and made my own lip scrub with coconut oil and brown sugar, maybe even some honey. I probably won't be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Tullman

customer_reviews.title: If you have dry lips this is a MUST
customer_reviews.text: I use this every morning after I finish my skincare routine, and it gets rid of any dead skin I have on my lips. I always make sure to moisturize (chapstick, Aquaphor, etc.) after using this product to ensure my lips do not get dry. It comes in a good size tub, so you get your money's worth. Also, if you happen to get some in your mouth, it tastes yummy!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great Sugar Lip Scrub
customer_reviews.text: I love this sugar based product for my lips! I had gone to HI but when I returned to Seattle the weather changes made my lips dry and cracked...so I ordered a bottle of this scrub and within a few days my lips were smooth and felt way better. Organic and tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not a good scrub
customer_reviews.text: To greasy . Will not buy again. Sugar granules to large
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. My lips are very smooth after using this. I would definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: OhioHeidi

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it
customer_reviews.text: First time using this and I Loved it for some reason every time I put on any thing in my lips make up related don’t be nasty ladies my lips get dry and shap I hate it so I purchased this and it rubs off all you dead sling from your lips. Afterward they feel nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

product_meta.title: Hanalei Sugar Lip Scrub Exfoliator: Dry Lip Care Made with Hawaiian Raw Cane Sugar, Hawaiian Kukui Nut Oil and Shea Butter for Dry Lips(Cruelty free, Paraben free) - 22 Grams
feature_bullets: SOFT HEALTHY SKIN: Get plump, supple skin all year round with a repair and refresh sugar lip scrub
SCRUB AND BUFF: Massage onto damp skin to ditch dry skin and reveal softer, plumper skin
LOCK IN MOISTURE: The shea butter works to hydrate and soothe skin after removing the dry, dead skin
NATURAL BEAUTY CARE: Our scrub keeps skin healthy thanks to its vitamin rich, paraben free formula
NO ANIMAL TESTING: Hanalei is a cruelty free brand enrolled in PETA's Beauty Without Bunnies program. Want to try a free sample? Or want a refund? Contact us (Hanalei)!
